title: Scout can save/submit an amateur player
custom_steps:
Log onto EBIS as a scout
Click on the Create New widget and select Amateur player.
Populate the fields in the Create New widget and click next
Fill in eligible year, click save.
Fill out the rest of the required fields on the page, and press submit. Notifications will appear to indicate player has been successfully saved and submitted. Additional popup message will appear asking "would you like to create a report for this player?" click Close.
custom_expected:
Blue notification notifies user that player has been saved successfully.
Profile should now be in view mode and once on home dashboard, player should appear on creating scouts clipboard as "Submitted"
Player  should not appear for other scouts on their clipboard, but SHOULD appear for all admins.

title: Scout can submit a new school
custom_steps:
Click on the Create New widget and select School.
Populate the fields in the Create New widget and click next
Fill out all required fields and click submit.
Click Close when message appears to ask if you would like to create a School Report.
Click on the Home tab on the left side of the screen.
custom_expected:
The system will display the following fields in the Create New widget: School Name, School Type, Country, City, State.
The system will display your populated fields along with the School Profile that needs to be filled out.
The system will display a message saying the submission was successful, and it will ask if you would like to create a School Report.
This action will take you to your dashboard.

title: Scout can submit a new amateur team
custom_steps:
Click on the Create New widget and select Amateur Team.
Populate the fields in the Create New widget and click next
Fill out the rest of the required fields on the page, and press submit.
Click on the Home tab on the left side of the screen.
custom_expected:
The system will display the following fields in the Create New widget: Team Name, Group Type, Country, Team Type, State.
The system will display your populated fields along with the Team Profile that needs to be filled out.
The system will display a message saying the submission was successful, and it will ask if you would like to create an Amateur Team Report. Click close.
You newly created amateur player, school, and team should all show up in your clipborad widget with proper statuses ( preliminary for saved, submitted for submitted items).

title: Scout can save a prospect report
custom_steps:
In the 'Create New Widget" click on the arrrow to the right of the textbox at the top of the widget.
From dropdown selections, choose "amateur player report"
Choose an existing player by typing in 3-4 letters of players last name and choosing player from auto completer drop down
From report type dropdowns next to player selection,  default report type should be set to "prospect"
Leave default report type to prospect, click next.
Populate the required fields
You must populate the fields with a red asterisks next to the box
There are 3 sections that make up the Player Report: Report Information, Player Evaluation and Summary
Under the Player Evaulation section, enter P/F values- must be between 2-8, or 0, enter comments
Fill in all required fields under "summary' section of player report
Click Submit button. Message will popup asking "Are you sure you want to submit? Click yes.
custom_expected:
The dropdown menu will be expanded
The system should display a Name field and Report Type field
Players name is displayed in first text field.
The Dropdown box should appear in the following order: Change, Prospect, Remove, Signable and Update- but default option is always prospect.
Report creation page will load
Red asterisks will indicate with fields are required to be filled in
If you do not populate all required fields, you see a error message appear if you try and submit.
Each section has their own required fields
The P and F coulmns should automatically tab over to the next column after typing a number.
all fields are populated with test data
The Player Report should appear on Scout Clipboard

title: Scout can submit a school team report
custom_steps:
Log in using the username Scout-MLSB-2 and using the password skipper99. Hit Enter
Click on the Create New Widget
Click on School Team Report
Click Next
Fill out the remaining information required: Season or Event dropbox, Team Pitcher Roster and Team Hitter Roster section
Click Submit, Save or Cancel at the bottom of Report page.
custom_expected:
Action will take you to the home page dashboard
The dropdown should expand. Scroll down until you reach School Team Report.
Fill out the School name field, and all other fieldsshould auto-populate.
You should be brought to the School Team Report page.
You should see a Submit, Save and Cancel button
If you Submit or Save, your report should appear on the Scout Clipboard

title: Scout can save an amateur team report
custom_steps:
Log in using the username Scout-MLSB-2 and using the password skipper99. Hit Enter
In the create new widget, select the amateur team report option from the drop down (default amateur player)
Input an amateur team in the required field. After putting three letters in the field, an option list should drop down, and you can select a school from that based on the three letters you put in, click next
In the Team report section, fill in the required field 'dates seen'
Skip the team info section
Fill in the team pitcher roster. After putting in three letters, options will appear that you can select. Complete the fields that did not autopopulate including the comments section. You can also add a row and complete this step again
Fill in the team hitter roster. After putting in three letters, options will appear that you can select. Complete the fields that did not autopopulate including the commens section. You can also add a row and complete this step again.
Click submit.
Look in Scouting Admin Clipboard widget and check the box next to the entered date for the amateur team report you just entered when in Scout
Click Approve
Click okay on that box
custom_expected:
Action will take you to the home page dashboard
Action will keep you in the create new widget with the a space to input the amateur team
Action will take you to the amateur team report page where you must fill in the reqired fields
Once clicked, a drop down calendar will show and you can select the dates from that
Everything in there should have been already populated because it is team information already in the system
When selecting the pitcher, certain fields should auto-populate. Pos, Age, Ht, Wt, B/T, Class should all autopopulate.
When selecting the hitter, certain fields will auto-populate. Pos, Age, Ht, Wt, B/T, class should all populate
If something was wrong on the report, and error message will come up explaining what was wrong in the report. If correct, a small blue notification box will appear in the bottom right of the screen.
Check box should be green
A box should show up saying approval success
Should bring you back to the home screen and the scounting admin clipboard should reload. You should not see the report you just approved in the widget any longer

title: Scout can submit a vision report
custom_steps:
Log in using the username Scout-MLSB-2 and using the password skipper99. Hit Enter
In the create new widget, select the vision report option from the drop down (default amateur player)
Input a name in the required field. After putting three letters in the field, an option list should drop down, and you can select a school from that based on the three letters you put in, click next
Complete the required fields on Report information (Examined by and examined date)
Complete the required fields for section Test 1-3
Skip section Test 4
Complete sections that are required for Test 5-6
Click submit.
Look in Scouting Admin Clipboard widget and check the box next to the entered date for the signability report you just entered when in Scout
Click Approve
Click okay on that box
custom_expected:
Action will take you to the home page dashboard
Action will keep you in the create new widget with the a space to input a name
Action will take you to the vision report page where you must fill in the reqired fields
Examined by and Examined date will be required
Test 1, Test 2, and Test 3 are all required. You should only be able to click one of the options in each test. If you go to click on another, the previous answer will disappear
Nothing is required
Section tests 5 + 5a + 6 are completed.
If something was wrong on the report, and error message will come up explaining what was wrong in the report. If correct, a small blue notification box will appear in the bottom right of the screen.
Check box should be green
A box should show up saying approval success
Should bring you back to the home screen and the scounting admin clipboard should reload. You should not see the report you just approved in the widget any longer

title: Scout can save players on video log sheet
custom_steps:
Add Video log sheet as a widget on Home
Click Add rows
Click Save
Click New Sheet
Click yes
Click Print button
Click Excel button
custom_expected:
Home Dashboard will display video log sheet as a widget
Rows should be added to widget
Added rows should be saved
Message will pop up "are you sure, changes will be lost
Changes are lost if there are any, widget displays new sheet.
Widget data should print to a PDF file
Widget data should export to Excel

title: Scout can add a new school schedule
custom_steps:
Use quick search to search for a school ( use arrow to change radio button from player to schools first)
Click on School name
Click on SCHEDULE tab from upper right hand corner
Click Create New button
Select year and season, click Create
Click Add row, Fill in date, location and opponent
Click Save
Click Submit
custom_expected:
Drop down will display list of relevant schools
School profile will open
Schedule tab will display
Window will pop up
Blank schedule will appear with year and season prefilled.
Fields should fill in, opponent will auto populate w school name
Schedule will be saved
Schedule will be submitted and saved.

title: Scout can make player updates to approved profiles
custom_steps:
Login as a scout
Quick search any player who has an approved profile
Click Edit
Edit any 2-3 fields
Click Submit
custom_expected:
On Submit, new changes are saved
On logging in as a scout admin, the entry appears on the scout admin clipboard as "Player Updated"
Clicking on the "Player Updated" link will open the profile with the scout changes in RED TEXT

title: Admin can view and approve the player update
custom_steps:
Run (T202889) - Make updates to a player profile as a scout
Login as an admin
Find the "Player Updated" link on the clipboard
CLick on the link to open the profile
All changes made should appear in RED TEXT
Click Approve button
custom_expected:
Player updates are approved and saved.
Changes are made for all users

title: Admin Can approve an item from the clipboard
custom_steps:
Login as scout admin
View the clipboard
Make checkmarks next to one or two items, and click Approve Button
Message will pop up are you sure?
Click Yes
custom_expected: Item will have a status of approved, and disappear from the clipboard.

title: Admin Can Reject an item from the clipboard
custom_steps:
Login as scout admin
View the clipboard
Make checkmarks next to one or two items, and click Reject Button
Message will pop up are you sure?
Click Yes
custom_expected:
Items are rejected, and will disappear off the clipboard.
On signing in as the scout who submitted the item, the item is back on their clipboard with Status of rejected and opens in EDIT mode.

title: Admin can create new scout profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as scout admin
  AND user selects "scout" from create new dropdown
custom_steps:
WHEN user is taken to new scout profile
  AND fills in all required fields and checks active checkbox, clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the new scout profile is saved
   AND new scout appears in scout directory/searches

title: Scout can print an approved report
custom_steps:
Login as a scout
Click on Search on left nav
Add Filters to search for any report > status > Approved
From search results, click on any approved report
Click Print button
custom_expected: Print buttons should open a PDF file and you should be able to view all the data on the report
